casebody.data:
Roger SAUNDERS, TRUSTEE OF ROGER SAUNDERS MONEY PURCHASE PLAN
v.
KDFBS, LLC, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 20, 2018

The petition by the defendants Daniel Davis and Karen Davis for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 40918) is granted, limited to the following issue:

"Did the Appellate Court properly dismiss the defendants' appeal from the determination of priority of mortgages for lack of a final judgment in accordance with State v. Curcio, 191 Conn. 27, 31, 463 A.2d 566 (1983)?"
